data: E-501: Thermal Overload / Overheating Description: Fluid temperature sensor reads above 85°C. Possible Causes: Cooler fan failure, heat exchanger blockage, or excessive duty cycle. Action: Reduce system load. Check the water-cooling flow or clean the air-cooler fins.

[2023-11-02] Technician: A. Muller Emergency repair. System shut down with Error E-501. Investigation: The cooling fan was not spinning. Action: Discovered a blown fuse in the 24V control circuit. Replaced fuse. Fan is now operational. Temperature dropped to 55°C within 10 minutes.
